Package swinghelper.util

Annotation Type ColorScheme

@Retention(RUNTIME)
@Target(FIELD)
public @interface ColorScheme
Allow formatting buttons. Only works on buttons and 1d arrays of buttons.
Author:
NumericPrime

  • Optional Element Summary

    Optional Elements 
    Modifier and Type Optional Element Description
    java.lang.String background  
    java.lang.String border  
    int fontSize
    Even though it says the font size is -1 it will just keep the original font size unless a value >0 is given.
    java.lang.String text  
    int thickness  

  • Element Details

    • background

      java.lang.String background
      Default:
      ""

    • text

      java.lang.String text
      Default:
      ""

    • border

      java.lang.String border
      Default:
      ""

    • thickness

      int thickness
      Default:
      0

    • fontSize

      int fontSize
      Even though it says the font size is -1 it will just keep the original font size unless a value >0 is given.
      Default:
      -1
